game.name: TS Marketplace: Rheintalbahn Scenario Pack Vol. 1
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Rhine Valley railway is one of the most important and busiest connections within Europe. Especially for freight traffic, this route has steadily increased in importance over the last twenty years. Experience the special features of the line in this scenario pack!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Rhine Valley railway is one of the most important and busiest connections within Europe. Especially for freight traffic, this route has steadily increased in importance over the last twenty years. Experience the special features of the line in this scenario pack!
